overview:
Jason is a consistently developing and improving, top performing Management, Operations and Technology Executive and Entrepreneur.

Those who have worked with/for Jason would say he is a Caring and Participative Management Professional, Results-focused, Entrepreneurial and Practical, Passionate about Staff Development through Coaching and Career Planning with a History of Customer and Employee Retention through Superior Service Delivery and Leadership

With 14 years of experience in business and technology, Jason has seen firsthand the role that technological advancement can play in sustaining a competitive advantage. With the privileges and experiences he has had thus far, Jason possesses a broadly informed understanding of the importance of building a consistent culture of innovation and creativity in a number of business contexts. His roles have included start-up planning and execution, fundraising, sales and marketing planning and implementation, technology service delivery and employee motivation and coaching.

Jason uses his enthusiasm, passion and charisma to inspire colleagues and clients and rally them around a common goal. He strives to embody the highest standards of results-oriented performance while remaining a leader unconditionally dedicated to collaborating with and serving others.
